text: Joseph Michael Cook (born April 7, 1985) is a professional basketball coach, formerly Associate head coach for San-en NeoPhoenix in Japan and a former college basketball assistant coach for Cabrillo College. Joe Cook also served for the Sacramento Kings of the NBA as the Head Video Coordinator http://www.nba.com/kings/media/2011-12MediaGuide_staffv3.pdf and Akita Northern Happinets as Assistant Coach for three seasons.
